com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Class MultiChoiceArgument.Builder<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.MultiChoiceArgument.Builder<V>
  • Enclosing class:
    MultiChoiceArgument<V>

    public static final class MultiChoiceArgument.Builder<V>
extends Object
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing MultiChoiceArgument.
